committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA and SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to repeal the credit elsewhere test in determining the interest rates applicable to homeowners and businesses on disaster loans.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to repeal provisions which specify the maximum interest rates on disaster loans made by the Small Business Administration (SBA) to homeowners and small businesses unable to obtain credit elsewhere. Specifies the maximum interest rate which shall apply to all disaster loans made by the SBA.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to repeal the credit elsewhere test in determining the interest rates applicable to homeowners and businesses on disaster loans.
